name: Fruits Fields
overview: Fruits Fields is a puzzle game where the object is to collect all the fruit. In the way are blocks with arrows. They can be triggered from any side except the one to which the arrow is pointing. They will then slide in the direction of the arrow till they reach something that stops them. Blocks can be crushed by pushing them into a wall, another block or against fruit. However a block cannot be crushed against a block pointing in the opposite direction. Such a pair of blocks is immovable and indestructible. The game consists of 100 levels (phases). Construction mode is also available.
